name: serpbear
description: SerpBear is a self-hosted SEO rank tracker that monitors keyword positions across search engines. It offers charts, projects, and scheduled checks via a clean, mobile-friendly web UI.
features: Keyword tracking: Monitors search engine rankings for target keywords across Google and other engines.
Position history: Charts ranking changes over time to identify trends and opportunities.
Project organization: Groups keywords into projects for managing multiple websites or clients.
Scheduled checks: Automatically updates rankings on configurable schedules.
Mobile and desktop: Tracks rankings separately for mobile and desktop search results.
Location targeting: Monitors rankings for specific countries, regions, or cities.
Competitor tracking: Compares your rankings against competitor domains for the same keywords.
Email notifications: Sends alerts when rankings change significantly or reach thresholds.
Search volume data: Displays estimated search volume for tracked keywords.
Export reports: Generates CSV or PDF reports for client presentations or analysis.
API access: Query ranking data programmatically for custom dashboards or integrations.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage keyword tracking from any device.
